ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000O5R3U:ref

I would like to request a Zoom meeting for 30 min. I want to go over the
www.facebook.com spam. I've noticed if I visit forkable, sometimes on our
CAP logs it triggers www.facebook.com and sometimes it does not. We also
fixed our contextual detection rule last week with Flaviu with an update.
Now the contextual list is not applying anymore today and we are getting
false positives again.

*Ismail Reyhanoglu*
*IT Security Engineer Intern*
GCIH • GSEC • AWS Solutions Architect • CCNA • Security+ • AWS Cloud
Practitioner • A+ Certified

Subject: Schedule Meeting for "Netwrix Support Ticket #00442185"

TextBody:
Hi Ismail,

Thank you for joining the meeting today.

As discussed, please find below the steps to generate the EPP client logs for Mac:

Generate logs:

	sudo /bin/launchctl unload /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.cososys.eppclient.launchdaemon.plist
	sudo touch /private/var/log/eppclient.log
	sudo touch /private/var/log/eppsslsplit.log
	sudo /bin/launchctl load /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.cososys.eppclient.launchdaemon.plist

Reproduce the issue.

Copy to desktop:

	cp /private/var/log/eppclient.log ~/Desktop
	cp /private/var/log/eppsslsplit.log ~/Desktop
	cp /etc/epp/reprovision.db ~/Desktop
	cp /etc/epp/rights.s3db ~/Desktop
	cp /etc/epp/netdlp/netdlp_settings.json ~/Desktop

Please attach the files from the Desktop to this support case.

Thank you!


Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com

TextBody: ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000O5R3U:ref This ticket we can close. Its because the websites call facebook in the background for ads thats why it is showing. *Ismail Reyhanoglu* *IT Security Engineer Intern* GCIH • GSEC • AWS Solutions Architect • CCNA • Security+ • AWS Cloud Practitioner • A+ Certified On Fri, Apr 18, 2025 at 11:53 AM Netwrix Support wrote: > Hello Ismail, > > I wanted to follow up on my previous email regarding the files we need > from you. Once you have the files ready, you can easily upload them to our > Customer Portal at www.netwrix.com/support. > > If you’re experiencing any issues with the upload or need further > assistance, please let me know—I’m here to help! > > Looking forward to your response. > > *Ticket Number:* 00442185 > *Ticket Subject:* CAP Repot Flooding > *Ticket Details:* We have a denylist that has been working fine. Today, I > check the logs and there is so many Content Threat Blocked for Facebook.com. It shows the > majoiry for a user we have, and it also shows for me. I am not even > visiting facebook and the user isnt visiting facebook too. How can we stop > the spam from showing up, this didn't happen before. > > Thank you! > > Iosif Muntean > Technical Support Engineer Tier 1 > ____________________ _________ > *Cybersecurity That Works for You* > > 6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034 > www.netwrix.com > > ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0O5R3U:ref >
